  • Worm January 2 - 06:05 pm

By Penguin God on Wednesday, February 10, 2010 - 06:23 am:

Here is just a little article interview with Koichi Yamaguchi, a producer from Tecmo. There hasn't been very much information lately about our favorite series, but at least this is something.

http://www.siliconera.com/2010/02/05/how-monster-rancher-ds-utilizes-the-nintendo-ds-hardware/

It just goes over what most of us already know about the game, but he does say that he would really like the bring the game back to consoles, so cross your fingers!

Another thing, I directly tweeted Tecmos tweeter account and got a few replies. Saddly no answer to the question about a set release date or why it's not listed with gamestop yet. But if enough of us show interest maybe they will let something loose and stop talking about Fret Nice. :P
